description: BIDI mode baseline - process_payment with denial flow (MULTI-REQUEST: confirmation + rejection)
scenario: User denies process_payment tool call - complete flow from confirmation request to rejection
note: This fixture captures TWO separate HTTP requests: (1) Initial request ending with confirmation [DONE], (2) Denial response ending with rejection [DONE]. It serves as documentation of the complete denial flow, not for single-stream transport testing. Transport tests verify one [DONE] per stream.

messages.content: 次郎さんに200ドル送金してください

toolConfirmation.hint: Please approve or reject the tool call process_payment() by responding with a FunctionResponse with an expected ToolConfirmation payload.

expectedChunks.delta: 次郎さんへの200ドルの送金リクエストは承認されませんでした。再度実行が必要な場合はお知らせください。
